SEARCH
Package order

Class Order

java.lang.Object
order.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
IXlsxSerializable
public class Order extends Object implements IXlsxSerializable
Order class represents an Order placed by a customer.

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(String orderID, String branch, ArrayList<MenuItem> items, ArrayList<String> customisation, boolean takeaway, double totalAmount, String payment)
      Constructs an Order.
      Parameters:
      orderID - This Order's orderID.
      branch - The Branch of this Order.
      items - The existing MenuItems in this Order.
      customisation - This Order's customisations.
      takeaway - The pickup option of this Order.
      totalAmount - The total amount of the MenuItems in this Order.
      payment - The payment method used for this Order.

    • Order

      items - The existing MenuItems in this Order.
      customisation - This Order's customisations.
      takeaway - The pickup option of this Order.
      payment - The payment method used for this Order.

      Convert Order details to String for serialisation.
      Specified by:
      toXlsx in interface IXlsxSerializable
      Returns:
      String array of this Order's details.

      Get customisations of this Order.
      Returns:

    • isTakeaway

      public boolean isTakeaway()
      Get the pickup option of this Order.
      Returns:
      true if the option is Takeaway, and false otherwise.

    • getItems

      public ArrayList<MenuItem> getItems()
      Get the MenuItems in this Order.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(OrderStatus status)
      Set the OrderStatus of this Order.
      Parameters:
      status - Status of this Order.

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder()
      Verifies that payment method has been selected, and processes this Order if so. OrderStatus of this Order is initialised to NEW.

    • calculateTotal

      public double calculateTotal()
      Calculates the total amount of the MenuItems in this Order.
      Returns:
      Total amount of this Order in 2 decimal point form.

    • pay

      public static Payment pay()
      Prompts customer to select which payment method to use after displaying available payment methods.
      Returns:
      Customer's selected Payment method.

    • printReceipt

      public void printReceipt()
      Prints receipt entailing the details of this Order.
